description: A girl who Shinkuro lived with when he was young and also his sparring partner. She comes from a family that used to be assassins but still practice the martial arts. Her soft demeanour hides the fact that she is a strong fighter. She also seems to have a crush on Shinkuro and likes to spend time with him. Yuuno has a younger sister named Chizuru, who is five. Their grandfather expects Yuuno and Chizuru to carry on the Houzuki family martial arts skills.
name: Houzuki Yuuno
